title: Was the suspect in the murder of a seven-year-old girl released on bail hours before she was shot?
subtitle: Norris died two days after he was shot in the head while sitting in a car in the city of Forrest, North Carolina.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Shaquil Marshon Francis, charged with the murder of Alia Norris, was released in an unrelated case about three hours before she was shot.
